Name: Cutter
Description: In the underworld of the Dusk, there are scoundrels who take what they want at the bloody edge of a blade or with a threatening presence that can stop a man cold. They are the enforcers, the debt collectors, the killers, the leg-breakers, and the thugs, commonly known as %Name%.
Where subtlety fails, swift brutality - and the threat of worse to come - can solve the problem. Or at least turn it into a different kind of problem.
XpTrigger: You earn xp when you address a challenge with violence or coercion.

Name: Hound
Description: There's always a need for scoundrels who can find what others want to keep hidden. Whether that's a deadbeat gambler trying to skip out on their debts, a treacherous informant or witness who's going to squeal to the Bluecoats, or the trail to a treasure squirreled away in a secret vault - it's the %Name%s that ferret them out.
Why have a fair fight, when you can stalk and ambush your prety on your terms? The underworld is your hunting ground.
XpTrigger: You earn xp when you address a challenge with tracking or violence.

Name: Leech
Description: The world is built on industry, and the underworld is no different. %Name%es are the scoundrels who distill the drugs, refine the arcane essences, build the bombs, bandage the wounds, and forge the tools of the criminal trades - and knowing how to make things also means knowing how to break them.
XpTrigger: You earn xp when you address a challenge with technical skill or mayhem.
